h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: Other times, he’ll lift off the ground a bit to slam one fist down, and detonate both with a small area of effect blast. This is a perfect attack to try retreating using the Thrust Stance and hitting him from a distance with a charged heavy attack while out of range of the blast.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, he’ll lift off the ground a bit to slam one fist down, and detonate both with a small area of effect blast. This is a perfect attack to try retreating using the Thrust Stance and hitting him from a distance with a charged heavy attack while out of range of the blast.
